content.question: Directions: You have 25 minutes to answer the following question. It is suggested that you take up to 5 minutes of this time to plan and outline your answer. The international borders of African countries are a legacy of colonialism. Describe the concept of a superimposed boundary. Describe three political or cultural consequences of superimposed boundaries in Africa. Identify and explain one challenge landlocked African countries face in developing viable economies.

frqParts.text: Directions: You have 25 minutes to answer the following question. It is suggested that you take up to 5 minutes of this time to plan and outline your answer. skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
